mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段
FROM Student a
and a.id in
#{item}
and a.username like CONCAT('%',#{params.username},'%')
and a.password like CONCAT('%',#{params.password},'%')
and a.Student_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.StudentName},'%')
and a.Student_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.StudentPhone},'%')
and a.Student_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.StudentIdNumber},'%')
and a.sex_types = #{params.sexTypes}
and a.Student_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.StudentEmail},'%')
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
